PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-09972012-07-10AAFC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Grain Act
SubjectRegulations Respecting Research, Market Development and Technical Assistance (Wheat and Barley)
PrecisREGULATIONS RESPECTING RESEARCH, MARKET DEVELOPMENT AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE (WHEAT AND BARLEY) in order to (1) continue producer funding for wheat and barley research, market development and technical assistance on an interim basis; and (2) establish a transitional deduction with characteristics that closely mirror the current Canadian Wheat Board funding.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0152 Publication Date: 2012-08-15
AttachmentsAttachment
